transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji sir.

Executive: Ji namaskar sir. Hello. Kaisa hai na? Ji namaskar ji.

Executive: Kaise hai sir?

Customer: Badhiya.

Executive: Sab ji baat kar raha hu.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Kya baat hai tabiyat thik nahi hai kya?

Customer: Haan thik badhiya hai.

Executive: Okay. Mai keh raha hu jo aaj subah maine do lead bheji thi.

Customer: Haan unse contact hua na maine.

Executive: Dono se contact ho gaya?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Dono se contact ho gaya?

Customer: Amritsar wale se hua contact. Soni karke hai na.

Executive: Haan wahi to kyuki ek to wo turant hat gayi thi turant wo sold out ho gayi.

Customer: Uske paas apna kaam bhi chal raha hai jaha pe Taran Taran hai na. Haan ye Amritsar 55 square feet wala.

Customer: Haan 55 se uske baad baat hui sir.

Executive: To kya bataya usne?

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Kya baat hui usse? Response diya achha bole mai dekhti hu sir se baat karti hu.

Executive: Achha. Thik hai aap lead manager me to hoga hi isko thoda connect banaye rakhna aap thoda thoda. Hai na ya agar uske nazar usse thoda thoda connect banaye rakhna aap.

Customer: Bilkul bilkul sir.

Executive: Haan aur jo us din nahi sir.

Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul sahi baat hai aur jo us din haan bataye.

Customer: Mera siddhant aisa hai siddhant ji mai jaise koi marvel bhi nahi deta na to bhi usse relation banaye rakhta hu jaise bhi koi festival wagera aate hai na kis bande ko kab jarurat pad jaye kis chiz ki.

Executive: Sahi baat hai.

Customer: To mai unse banaye rakhta hu unke mere kaam hai. Meri baat hai jaruri nahi hai na ki unki dukan pe agar 10 customer aaye to unko maine mera ek Taran Taran ka jo kaam chal raha hai na Govindwal sahab sikko ka bada gurudwara hai.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Sikko ka bada gurudwara hai Amritsar ke paas me. Teesre number pe aate hai wo Govindwal sahab waha ka apna kaam chal raha hai. Waha ka unko agreement wagera sab kuch bataya maine unko send kiya maine.

Executive: Achha.

Executive: Haan to fir to matlab connect ho gaya achha jagah bhi.

Customer: Hmm. Ji aur jo parso diya tha maine wo 3500 wala uska kya hua?

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Parso ek diya tha maine aapko 3500 square feet wala.

Customer: Wo bhi chalta hai sir ye jyadatar kya bolta hai ki sir abhi hum check kar rahe the abhi hum dekh rahe hai agar jaise hamara hoga to hum aapko batayenge.

Executive: Achha kehne ka matlab ye hai ki inki requirement hone wali hoti hai but ye lead pehle hi dal dete hai.

Customer: Haan ye jyadatar aise hi karte hai aur ye 70-80% bande to call uthate nahi kyuki baar baar call jate hai na naye number se unke IndiaMART se.

Executive: Haan to isliye aur

Customer: Isliye uthate nahi. To call uthate nahi to mai fir bhi whatsapp pe aur photo wagera dal deta hu. Jo bhi meri sari hai na catalog banaya hua hai aapka IndiaMART wala to hai hi aur mera jo whatsapp business ka catalog hai wo bhi dal deta hu.

Customer: Ye dekho lead jo maine aapko lead bheji hai na sir aisa nahi hai ki maine kahin se nikali hai ye aapki hi lead hai jo matlab aapki lead manager me aati hai aapne mobile se consume karna unko. Nahi mai aapko sorry kar raha hu mai sir keh raha hu customer hai na.

Executive: Mai ek se ek check kar rahe hai abhi wo kar rahe hai abhi hame time lagega abhi do mahine lagenge hum jaise hi hoga aapko batayenge.

Customer: Haan to mai keh raha hu dekho abhi ke time humne jo update kiya tha na wo apna minimum order quantity update kiya tha. To uske baad dekho dhire dhire aana start ho gaye right aapko us din maine 3000 diya abhi 5000 5500 ka diya thik hai to usi tarah dhire dhire aana start ho jayega bas ye hai na aap thoda abhi starting thoda jyada active rahiye.

Executive: Sir pehle mai aapko batau sir sari leads leads khatam kar di.

Customer: Haan abhi kal ka din bacha hai aaj ka din bacha hai.

Executive: Ab isse jyada jab aapko sham sir sham ko jab aapko maine call kiya tha.

Customer: Hmm kal Jaipur jana hai night me.

Executive: Achha jab kal sham ko jo maine baat ki thi na aapse wo kareeb 5 baje ke aas paas.

Customer: Haan ek Mumbai wale se baat hui hai wo Thane ka tha na Bhiwandi ka.

Executive: Thane ka Bhiwandi ka dal diya tha unse baat hui meri mai Mumbai ja raha hu waise bhi aaj kal parso nikalunga Mumbai. Mumbai apna kaam chal raha hai Rawade railway station.

Executive: Achha. Navi Mumbai padna to sample leke ja raha hu unse bhi mulakat karke bola maine Fawad bhai karke hai.

Executive: Achha. Hmm Fawad Momin. To kal jo mai aapko bylead send kar raha tha na 5 baje 5 baje wali to usme kya hua pata hai ek bylead aayi thik hai aur us bylead ko jab tak mai screenshot leke aur post karta hu wahi wo 10 second me bylead sold out ho gayi. Haan bas yahi to dikkat hai sir jyadatar jo temple ki requirement aati hai temple me paisa banta achha hai wo temple wali requirement apne ko milti hi nahi hai.

Executive: Actually kya hota hai sir ye dekhiye jaise man lo aap active nahi ho us time me koi aur hoga jo active hoga to sold out ho jayega. Apni factory dikhai na maine aapko usme sara temple ka hi kaam hota hai.

Executive: Haan haan dekha maine dekha. To aise koi baat nahi dhire dhire aana kaam kaam aana start ho jayega ab jaise hi abhi ek aur factory hai jisme solid kaam hota hai bade bade Jain temple ka niche se jad se leke ye to ghar me rakhne wale mandir ki kaam hai aur wo kya Jain mandir wagera jo hote hai na wo niche se jad se kaam hota hai pura stone ka aur sara. To wo kya requirement mil jaye na ki construction temple hota hai na to wo karodo ka hota hai sir.

Executive: Chalo sahi hai. Wo karodo me deal hote hai sir.

Executive: Hmm. Ye jo mai kal aapko bol raha tha Bangalore society temple ka price galat bata raha hai ye kisne update kiya hai isko?

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Bangalore and society temple jo hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Kisne update kiya sir 27000 bata raha hai 8000 per piece kya bata raha hai isme 25 lakh ke aas paas hai.

Executive: Ye construction temple hai na sir wo cubic feet ke andar hota hai construction temple work.

Customer: Nahi ye Bangalore and society temple. Ye kya kya likha hua hai?

Customer: Ye 8000 per piece pada hai price.

Executive: Sir maine to nahi dala aapne karwaya maine to catalog khol ke nahi dekha abhi.

Customer: Nahi nahi wahi to keh raha hu parso humne update kiya tha to sahi tha ye kal galat hua hai to kisne update kiya hai.

Executive: To ye kaise ho raha hai?

Customer: Aap batao mai dal deta hu.

Executive: Hmm. Isko karo kam se kam 6-7 lakh karo 5 lakh 4 lakh 4 lakh kar do 4 lakh 4.5 lakh.

Customer: 4 4.5 haan kar na.

Executive: Haan 4.5 kar do.

Executive: Chalo 4.5 kar denge.

Customer: 4.5

Customer: Ye ye karta hai na 4.5 lakh ka.

Customer: Haan jo home temple society temple banglo.

Customer: Ye piece ke sath hota hai na piece.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Piece ke sath hota hai na ya cubic feet ke sath jata hai?

Executive: Piece me bhi hota hai aur koi waise jyada bada ho na to sir wo cubic feet me jata hai.

Customer: Chalo koi nahi maine abhi piece wala kar diya kyuki wo temple bhi piece wala hi hai.

Customer: Aur ye college marble floor flooring hai iska kya hai?

Executive: Ji.

Customer: College marble floor flooring iska price kya hai?

Executive: Flower?

Customer: Marble flower flooring.

Executive: Haan wo hai na maine bataya tha na unko 5500 ka bhi hai 5000 ka bhi hai 6000 ka bhi hai. Isme 5000 5500 kar do. Flower flower hai na?

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Wo to piece ke andar jate hai flower to apan ne add kiya tha na us din 5500 kuch aisa paisa likhaya tha apan ne.

Customer: 5000 likhaya hai.

Executive: Haan ji? 5000 hai isme sir do chiz do hai ek hai flooring flower marble thik hai. Haan. Aur ek hai marble floor flooring matlab product ek hi hai naam alag alag hai dono.

Executive: Wo kar diye honge ab video call karna mujhe aaj to jumma hai fir apan baith ke ek dafa aur sahi kar lenge. Haan us din ke liye na aaj to abhi kal parso chutti rahegi Friday hai aaj jumme ka namaz wagera ka hai fresh fresh. Koi na kal parso to chutti rahegi aur monday ko ya uske baad dekh lete hai hum ek baar dobara meeting kar lenge video me. Ji ji. Chaliye thik hai sir agar koi lead aati hai to mai bhej dunga aapko baki aap active rahiye sir us pe thik hai. Okay sir ab to wo leads khatam ho gayi na aaj to meri. Abhi to khatam ho gayi but agar ya to sunday ko aayegi ya kab aayegi sunday ko. Haan kal dekh lena. Kal dekh lena sunday ko aayegi sunday ko milegi apne ko wo. Haan. Offer wali. Hmm. Thik hai sir. Ji thik hai. Okay sir thank you ji. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about leads sent.

- Customer says Bangalore temple price is wrong.

- Customer says leads are exhausted.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed contact with leads.

- Executive will set the price for Bangalore temple.

- Executive asked to stay active on the portal.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will set the price for Bangalore temple.

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, price, temple, update
